clms_submison_house.claim_disclaimer_text1: I/We hereby declare the foregoing particulars to be true in every respect and that no information has been suppressed and that the sum claimed represents the amount I/We are entitled to claim in Terms of the Certificate. / Saya/Kami mengisytiharkan bahawa butiran sebelum ini adalah benar di dalam semua hubungan dan tiada informasi telah ditahankan dan bahawa jumlah yang dituntutkan merupai jumlah yang Saya/Kami berhak untuk menuntut di dalam Syarat-syarat Sijil.I/We understand and agree that any of my/our personal information collected or held by the Company (whether contained in this application or otherwise obtained) may be held, used, and disclosed by the Company to individuals or organisations related to or associated with the Company or any selected third party (within or outside of Malaysia, including retakaful and claims investigation companies and industry associations/federations) for the purpose of processing this application and providing subsequent service for this and to communicate with me/us for such purposes. I/We understand that I/we am/are entitled to obtain access to and to request correction of any personal information held by the Company and that such request can be made to the Company's Customer Careline at 1300-88-5055. I/We will keep the Company updated of any change to such personal information as soon as possible. / Saya/Kami memahami dan bersetuju bahawa sebarang maklumat peribadi saya/kami yang diperolehi atau disimpan oleh Syarikat (sama ada terkandung dalam permohonan ini atau diperolehi dengan cara lain) boleh disimpan, digunakan dan didedahkan oleh Syarikat kepada individu atau organisasi yang berkaitan dengan Syarikat atau mana-mana pihak ketiga yang terpilih (di dalam atau di luar Malaysia termasuk syarikat-syarikat takaful semula dan siasatan tuntutan serta persatuan/persekutuan industri) untuk tujuan pemprosesan permohonan ini dan memberikan perkhidmatan seterusnya untuk ini serta berhubung dengan saya/kami bagi tujuan tersebut. Saya/Kami memahami bahawa saya/kami berhak mendapat akses kepada maklumat tersebut dan meminta sebarang pembetulan dibuat ke atas mana-mana maklumat peribadi yang disimpan oleh Syarikat dan permintaan tersebut boleh dibuat kepada talian Khidmat Pelanggan Careline Syarikat di 1300-88-5055. Saya/Kami akan memaklumkan Syarikat mengenai sebarang perubahan kepada maklumat peribadi secepat mungkin.
clms_submison_house.claim_disclaimer_text2: I/We hereby declare that the information given is true and accurate to the best of my/our knowledge and record. I/We shall indemnify Sun Life Malaysia Assurance Berhad or Sun Life Malaysia Takaful Berhad for any loss arising from the reliance on the above information. In the event of any change in bank account, I/We shall notify you in writing no later than 7 days after the change.
clms_submison_house.claim_disclaimer_text3: Saya / Kami dengan ini mengaku bahawa maklumat yang diberikan adalah benar dan betul sepanjang pengetahuan dan rekod saya / kami. Saya / Kami akan menanggung rugi Sun Life Malaysia Berhad atau Sun Life Malaysia Takaful Berhad bagi apa-apa kerugian yang timbul daripada kehilangan pergantungan maklumat di atas. Jika berlaku apa-apa perubahan di dalam akaun bank, saya / kami akan memaklumkan kepada anda secara bertulis tidak lewat daripada 7 hari selepas perubahan itu.

clms_submison_illDeathClm.claim_disclaimer_text1: I/We hereby declare the foregoing particulars to be true in every respect and that no information has been suppressed and that the sum claimed represents the amount I/We are entitled to claim in Terms of the Certificate. / Saya/Kami mengisytiharkan bahawa butiran sebelum ini adalah benar di dalam semua hubungan dan tiada informasi telah ditahankan dan bahawa jumlah yang dituntutkan merupai jumlah yang Saya/Kami berhak untuk menuntut di dalam Syarat-syarat Sijil.I/We understand and agree that any of my/our personal information collected or held by the Company (whether contained in this application or otherwise obtained) may be held, used, and disclosed by the Company to individuals or organisations related to or associated with the Company or any selected third party (within or outside of Malaysia, including retakaful and claims investigation companies and industry associations/federations) for the purpose of processing this application and providing subsequent service for this and to communicate with me/us for such purposes. I/We understand that I/we am/are entitled to obtain access to and to request correction of any personal information held by the Company and that such request can be made to the Company's Customer Careline at 1300-88-5055. I/We will keep the Company updated of any change to such personal information as soon as possible. / Saya/Kami memahami dan bersetuju bahawa sebarang maklumat peribadi saya/kami yang diperolehi atau disimpan oleh Syarikat (sama ada terkandung dalam permohonan ini atau diperolehi dengan cara lain) boleh disimpan, digunakan dan didedahkan oleh Syarikat kepada individu atau organisasi yang berkaitan dengan Syarikat atau mana-mana pihak ketiga yang terpilih (di dalam atau di luar Malaysia termasuk syarikat-syarikat takaful semula dan siasatan tuntutan serta persatuan/persekutuan industri) untuk tujuan pemprosesan permohonan ini dan memberikan perkhidmatan seterusnya untuk ini serta berhubung dengan saya/kami bagi tujuan tersebut. Saya/Kami memahami bahawa saya/kami berhak mendapat akses kepada maklumat tersebut dan meminta sebarang pembetulan dibuat ke atas mana-mana maklumat peribadi yang disimpan oleh Syarikat dan permintaan tersebut boleh dibuat kepada talian Khidmat Pelanggan Careline Syarikat di 1300-88-5055. Saya/Kami akan memaklumkan Syarikat mengenai sebarang perubahan kepada maklumat peribadi secepat mungkin.
clms_submison_illDeathClm.claim_disclaimer_text2: I/We hereby declare that the information given is true and accurate to the best of my/our knowledge and record. I/We shall indemnify Sun Life Malaysia Assurance Berhad or Sun Life Malaysia Takaful Berhad for any loss arising from the reliance on the above information. In the event of any change in bank account, I/We shall notify you in writing no later than 7 days after the change.

about-malaysia.am1: Sun Life Malaysia (Sun Life Malaysia Assurance Berhad and Sun Life Malaysia Takaful Berhad) is a joint venture by Sun Life Financial Inc. and Avicennia Capital Sdn. Bhd., a fully owned Khazanah Nasional Berhad investment holding company, specialising in Insurance and Takaful.
about-malaysia.am2: Sun Life Malaysia offers a comprehensive range of life insurance and Takaful products and services to Malaysians across the country and is focused on helping Clients achieve lifetime financial security and live healthier lives. Sun Life Malaysia distributes its products through a range of distribution channels including bancassurance, direct marketing, telemarketing, agency, telcoassurance and government and corporate business.
about-malaysia.am3: Sun Life Financial is a leading international financial services organisation providing insurance, wealth and asset management solutions to individual and corporate Clients. Sun Life Financial has operations in a number of markets worldwide, including Canada, the United States, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Hong Kong, the Philippines, Japan, Indonesia, India, China, Australia, Singapore, Vietnam, Malaysia and Bermuda. As of 31 March 2018, Sun Life Financial had total assets under management (AUM) of CAD$979 billion. For more information, please visit www.sunlife.com.
about-malaysia.am4: Sun Life Financial Inc. trades on the Toronto (TSX), New York (NYSE) and Philippine (PSE) stock exchanges under the ticker symbol SLF.

update_direct_debit.guidelines_heading: A convenient, hassle free and cost effective interbank collection service to make recurring payments. By updating the direct debit details, your recurring premium/contribution payment will be paid automatically. From your bank account.
update_direct_debit.guidelines_note1: 1. You are authorising Sun Life Malaysia to deduct an amount equal to the premiums/contributions. For this policy/contract from your bank account by submitting the direct debit details.
update_direct_debit.guidelines_note2: 2. 3rd party payor is not allowable. The bank account registered must belong to you, the policy/contract. Owner of the policy/contract.
update_direct_debit.guidelines_note3: 3. To ensure the bank account registered is active for the purpose of the application for direct debit service, please note that RM1.00 shall be debited from the selected bank account and will be utilize to offset against next premium due.
update_direct_debit.terms_conditions2: hereby declare that I am the rightful policy/contract owner and authorize Sun Life Malaysia to deduct an amount equal to the premiums/contributions for the policy/contract from the selected bank account. I understand that Sun Life Malaysia has the right to reject this application in the event that it is found to be a third party payor. I acknowledge and authorize that upon successful completion of the online application, RM1.00 shall be debited from my selected bank account to ensure the said account is active for the purpose of the application of Direct Debit service and the RM1.00 will be utilize to offset against next premium/contribution due of the policy/contract.

terms_conditions.title: Terms & Conditions
terms_conditions.sub_head1: ACKNOWLEDGEMENT AND ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS OF SERVICE
terms_conditions.at1: The use of Sun Life Malaysia Assurance Malaysia Berhad and Sun Life Malaysia Takaful Berhad (collectively "Company") website (this "Website") is subject to the following Terms of Use (the "Terms"). By using this Website, you confirm your agreement with these Terms, as amended from time to time, without limitation or qualification. Please read these conditions carefully before using this Website.
terms_conditions.at2: The Company is committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected. Should the Company ask you for any information that can be used to personally identify you, be assured that it will only be used in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act 2010 (PDPA) and terms stated in this Terms.
terms_conditions.at3: The Company and its subsidiaries and affiliates reserve the right to amend these Terms at any time. You are bound by any such revisions and should therefore periodically visit this Websites to review the most updated and current conditions to which you are bound, which can be found by clicking the hyperlink "Terms of Use" at the bottom of this Website.
terms_conditions.at4: Additional or different terms and conditions may apply to specific products or services offered by or on behalf of the Company. It is therefore recommended that you familiarise yourself with the specific terms and conditions that apply to the products or services that you may procure from the Company.
terms_conditions.dn: To the fullest extent permissible pursuant to applicable laws and regulations:
terms_conditions.d1: This Website and all its content (including without limitation functions, text, data, materials, information, graphics, logos, icons, images, photographs, structure, arrangement, lay-out, "look and feel", audio clips, sounds, music, videos, and software, and any combination thereof) (the "Website Content") are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. The Company hereby disclaims any and all warranties, express or implied, including without limitation warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title and non-infringement of third party rights.
terms_conditions.d2: The Company does not warrant that this Website or the Website Content will be uninterrupted or error-free, that defects will be corrected, or that this Website, the Website Content, or the server that makes it available are free of viruses, contamination, destructive features or other harmful components.
terms_conditions.d3: The Company hereby disclaims any and all liability for the acts and omissions of third party in connection with or related to this Website, the Website Content or the Company's products or services.
terms_conditions.d4: The Company does not warrant or make any representations in terms of suitability, comprehensiveness, accuracy, reliability, or otherwise regarding the Website Content or its use or results. The Website Content is not intended to be or contain a complete description of all terms, conditions or exclusions applicable to the products and/or services described or referred to on this website, but is provided solely for informational purposes. For details please refer to the specific terms and conditions provided in the relevant policies or agreements.
terms_conditions.d5: Your sole remedy against the Company if you are dissatisfied with this Website or the Website Content is to stop using them.
terms_conditions.d6: The Company reserves the right to modify, suspend or terminate this Website or any portion thereof, its operation, or the access to this Website or any portion thereof, for any reason, at any time, and without notice.
